title: fizno knowledge box (docker image)
description:
a docker image for a knowledge box.

instructions:
* take a plug server with a big hard disk (1 Tb) and a wifi antenna
* install Docker on it (http://docker.io/)
* use "gunzip" and "docker import" to activate this container image

this torrent is part of our entry for the Freedom Hack Bangalore hackathon, in memory of Aaron Swartz.

see http://fizno.com/ for more details
